body:
Comment 2: 
The SSH package does not implement CBC mode ciphers as they are insecure.

http://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/958563

I am closing this issue as WorkingAsIntended, but please don't consider this the final
word. If there is a valid need to talk to hosts that only offer CBC mode ciphers, please
raise this request on the golang-nuts mailing list.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
